turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to book a flight. I'm flying from Chicago to Los Angeles next month.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help with that. Can you please tell me the exact dates you'd like to travel?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I want to fly out on November 10th and return on November 17th.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, searching for flights from Chicago (ORD) to Los Angeles (LAX) for November 10th to November 17th. Please wait a moment... I found several options. The cheapest round trip is currently $350 with Spirit Airlines. Would you like to see a list of all options?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Spirit?! Ugh, are there any other airlines? I really don't want to fly Spirit. I'm willing to pay a bit more for a better experience.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, of course. Let me filter out Spirit. Okay, with other airlines, the prices start at $450.  Do you have a preferred airline or time of day you'd like to fly?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: American Airlines or United would be great. And I prefer morning flights, ideally departing before 9 AM. Also, can you tell me what the baggage allowance is for the cheapest American Airlines option?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me check... Searching for American Airlines flights departing before 9 AM on November 10th and returning on November 17th. I am still gathering that baggage information for you. Unfortunately, it appears there are no American flights that meet your criteria at this moment. The closest is a United flight that departs at 9:15 AM. It allows one carry-on and one personal item. Checked bags are an additional cost.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, fine. I guess the 9:15 AM United flight will have to do. What's the total cost, including potential baggage fees?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: The total cost for the United flight, including estimated baggage fees (based on one checked bag each way), comes to $610. Would you like to proceed with booking? I can also send the baggage details to your email.
